CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page A20, reads: "Radio Station WHOD broadcast from the fair each of the three evenings. Products advertised on WHOD made up their booth. Ace deejays, Mary Dee and Walt Harper are shown here, with Hazel Garland, Courier woman's page feature writer."
TitMainTitle: Crowd gathered in front of WHOD trade show booth with disc jockey Mary Dee, and Hazel Garland, in Syria Mosque for the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
